stateDiagram

state CALIBRATION_STATES {

        CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY

        CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY : CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY

        CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY : enter / #123; CalibrateFrequencyEnter()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY : exit / #123; CalibrateFrequencyExit()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_RX_IQ

        CALIBRATE_RX_IQ : CALIBRATE_RX_IQ

        CALIBRATE_RX_IQ : enter / #123; CalibrateRXIQEnter()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_RX_IQ : exit / #123; CalibrateRXIQExit()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_SPACE

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_SPACE : CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_SPACE

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_SPACE : enter / #123; CalibrateTXIQEnter()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_SPACE : exit / #123; CalibrateTXIQExit()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_CW_PA

        CALIBRATE_CW_PA : CALIBRATE_CW_PA

        CALIBRATE_CW_PA : enter / #123; CalibrateCWPAEnter()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_CW_PA : exit / #123; CalibrateCWPAExit()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_SSB_PA

        CALIBRATE_SSB_PA : CALIBRATE_SSB_PA

        CALIBRATE_SSB_PA : enter / #123; CalibrateSSBPAEnter()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_SSB_PA : exit / #123; CalibrateSSBPAExit()#59; #125;

        state "$exit_pt.done" as CALIBRATION_STATES.(ExitPoint)(done)

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_MARK

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_MARK : CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_MARK

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_MARK : enter / #123; CalibrateTXIQEnter()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_MARK : exit / #123; CalibrateTXIQExit()#59; #125;

}

state NORMAL_STATES {

        SSB_RECEIVE

        SSB_RECEIVE : SSB_RECEIVE

        SSB_RECEIVE : enter / #123; ModeSSBReceiveEnter()#59; #125;

        SSB_RECEIVE : exit / #123; ModeSSBReceiveExit()#59; #125;

        CW_RECEIVE

        CW_RECEIVE : CW_RECEIVE

        CW_RECEIVE : enter / #123; ModeCWReceiveEnter()#59; #125;

        CW_RECEIVE : exit / #123; ModeCWReceiveExit()#59; #125;

        CW_RECEIVE : 1. do / #123; markCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

        SSB_TRANSMIT

        SSB_TRANSMIT : SSB_TRANSMIT

        SSB_TRANSMIT : enter / #123; ModeSSBTransmitEnter()#59; #125;

        SSB_TRANSMIT : exit / #123; ModeSSBTransmitExit()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_MARK

        CW_TRANSMIT_MARK : CW_TRANSMIT_MARK

        CW_TRANSMIT_MARK : enter / #123; ModeCWTransmitMarkEnter()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_MARK : exit / #123; ModeCWTransmitMarkExit()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_SPACE

        CW_TRANSMIT_SPACE : CW_TRANSMIT_SPACE

        CW_TRANSMIT_SPACE : enter / #123; ModeCWTransmitSpaceEnter()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_SPACE : enter / #123; spaceCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_SPACE : exit / #123; ModeCWTransmitSpaceExit()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_SPACE : 1. do / #123; spaceCount_ms++#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_DIT_MARK

        CW_TRANSMIT_DIT_MARK : CW_TRANSMIT_DIT_MARK

        CW_TRANSMIT_DIT_MARK : enter / #123; ModeCWTransmitMarkEnter()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_DIT_MARK : enter / #123; markCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_DIT_MARK : exit / #123; ModeCWTransmitMarkExit()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_DIT_MARK : 1. do / #123; markCount_ms++#59;\nspaceCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_SPACE

        CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_SPACE : CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_SPACE

        CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_SPACE : enter / #123; ModeCWTransmitSpaceEnter()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_SPACE : enter / #123; spaceCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_SPACE : 1. do / #123; spaceCount_ms++#59;\nmarkCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_WAIT

        CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_WAIT : CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_WAIT

        CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_WAIT : enter / #123; spaceCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_WAIT : exit / #123; ModeCWTransmitSpaceExit()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_WAIT : 1. do / #123; spaceCount_ms++#59;\nmarkCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_DAH_MARK

        CW_TRANSMIT_DAH_MARK : CW_TRANSMIT_DAH_MARK

        CW_TRANSMIT_DAH_MARK : enter / #123; ModeCWTransmitMarkEnter()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_DAH_MARK : enter / #123; markCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_DAH_MARK : exit / #123; ModeCWTransmitMarkExit()#59; #125;

        CW_TRANSMIT_DAH_MARK : 1. do / #123; markCount_ms++#59;\nspaceCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as NORMAL_STATES.(InitialState)

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY --> CALIBRATION_STATES.(ExitPoint)(done) : CALIBRATE_EXIT

CALIBRATE_RX_IQ --> CALIBRATION_STATES.(ExitPoint)(done) : CALIBRATE_EXIT

CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_SPACE --> CALIBRATION_STATES.(ExitPoint)(done) : CALIBRATE_EXIT

CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_SPACE --> CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_MARK : PTT_PRESSED

CALIBRATE_CW_PA --> CALIBRATION_STATES.(ExitPoint)(done) : CALIBRATE_EXIT

CALIBRATE_SSB_PA --> CALIBRATION_STATES.(ExitPoint)(done) : CALIBRATE_EXIT

CALIBRATION_STATES.(ExitPoint)(done) --> NORMAL_STATES

CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_MARK --> CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_SPACE : PTT_RELEASED

NORMAL_STATES --> CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY : CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY

NORMAL_STATES --> CALIBRATE_RX_IQ : CALIBRATE_RX_IQ

NORMAL_STATES --> CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_SPACE : CALIBRATE_TX_IQ

NORMAL_STATES --> CALIBRATE_CW_PA : CALIBRATE_CW_PA

NORMAL_STATES --> CALIBRATE_SSB_PA : CALIBRATE_SSB_PA

SSB_RECEIVE --> CW_RECEIVE : TO_CW_MODE

SSB_RECEIVE --> SSB_TRANSMIT : PTT_PRESSED

CW_RECEIVE --> SSB_RECEIVE : TO_SSB_MODE

CW_RECEIVE --> CW_TRANSMIT_MARK : KEY_PRESSED

CW_RECEIVE --> CW_TRANSMIT_DAH_MARK : DAH_PRESSED

CW_RECEIVE --> CW_TRANSMIT_DIT_MARK : DIT_PRESSED

SSB_TRANSMIT --> SSB_RECEIVE : PTT_RELEASED

CW_TRANSMIT_MARK --> CW_TRANSMIT_SPACE : KEY_RELEASED

CW_TRANSMIT_SPACE --> CW_TRANSMIT_MARK : KEY_PRESSED

CW_TRANSMIT_SPACE --> CW_RECEIVE : do [spaceCount_ms >= waitDuration_ms]

CW_TRANSMIT_DIT_MARK --> CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_SPACE : do [markCount_ms >= ditDuration_ms]

CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_SPACE --> CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_WAIT : do [spaceCount_ms >= ditDuration_ms]

CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_WAIT --> CW_RECEIVE : do [spaceCount_ms >= waitDuration_ms]

CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_WAIT --> CW_TRANSMIT_DIT_MARK : DIT_PRESSED

CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_WAIT --> CW_TRANSMIT_DAH_MARK : DAH_PRESSED

CW_TRANSMIT_DAH_MARK --> CW_TRANSMIT_KEYER_SPACE : do [markCount_ms >= 3*ditDuration_ms]

NORMAL_STATES.(InitialState) --> SSB_RECEIVE

ROOT.(InitialState) --> NORMAL_STATES
Events
settings
